GET(project/{id}): to get info about the indivisual project (id)->(mentioned in the URL) id your project id
POST(project/{userId}): to add a project (userId)->(mentioned in the URL) id of your user account
PATCH(project/{id}): to modify the description of the project
DELETE(project/{id}): to delete a project (id)->(mentioned in the URL) id your project id
PUT(/about): to replace about text (provide in body:{'about':'about text'})
PUT(/home): to replace home text (provide in body:{'home':'home text'})
